intro_success.title: Study Successful
intro_success.description: You managed to focus for a few hours. The material is dry, but you feel a sense of accomplishment. You found a receipt in the textbook.

intro_fail.title: Distracted
intro_fail.description: You tried to study, but without the textbook, you just stared at the wall. Your anxiety grows.

coffee_break.title: Caffeinated
coffee_break.description: The bitter liquid warms your soul. You feel ready to take on the world, or at least one more hour of calculus.

art_therapy.title: Art Therapy
art_therapy.description: You paint your feelings. It's messy, but it helps clear your mind.

art_practice.title: Studio Time
art_practice.description: You work on your technique. You produced some decent sketches. A new opportunity for your hobby has opened up.

board_decay.title: Overwhelmed
board_decay.description: The task was left unattended for too long. It weighs on your mind, draining your mental state.

study_note.title: Suspicious Note Found
study_note.description: While studying, you find a cryptic note tucked between pages of your textbook. It mentions strange occurrences around campus buildings.

shovel_success.title: Hard Work Pays Off
shovel_success.description: You cleared the snow from the pathways. Your roommate walks by and thanks you, and you earned some cash from the campus work program.

shovel_fail.title: Slipped and Fell
shovel_fail.description: You neglected to shovel the snow in time. Walking to class, you slipped on ice and bruised your ego (and your tailbone).

lecture_success.title: Met Someone New
lecture_success.description: During the lecture, you struck up a conversation with someone. They seem to know a lot about the strange happenings on campus.

roommate_store.title: Roommate's Stash
roommate_store.description: Your roommate has a surprising collection of energy drinks and coffee. You trade some cash for a caffeine boost.

rumor_map.title: Guard's Information
rumor_map.description: The guard, persuaded by your cash, shares a campus map with restricted areas marked. 'Be careful where you go,' they warn.

flooding_map.title: Pattern Emerges
flooding_map.description: Connecting the flooding incidents reveals a pattern. Someone marks a map with the affected buildings. A suspect emerges from the shadows.

map_footprints.title: Strange Discovery
map_footprints.description: Following the map leads you to wet footprints trailing from the basement. They're not quite human-shaped...

footprints_door.title: Hidden Entrance
footprints_door.description: The footprints lead to a concealed door in the basement wall. It's locked, but you now know it exists.

door_lab.title: Wereshark Laboratory
door_lab.description: Using the key, you unlock the hidden door. Inside is a secret experimental fish lab with strange aquariums. One tank has a nameplate for your roommate!

wereshark_lab.title: The Truth Revealed
wereshark_lab.description: The laboratory confirms your suspicions. The experimental wereshark research was centered here, and your roommate's name is all over the records.

accuse_correct.title: CASE SOLVED!
accuse_correct.description: You confront your roommate with the evidence. They confess - the wereshark experiments transformed them, and the flooding was their failed attempts to destroy the lab. The authorities take them away. You've solved the mystery!

accuse_wrong.title: False Accusation
accuse_wrong.description: You accused the wrong person! They're furious and everyone thinks you're losing your mind. Your sanity takes a massive hit from the embarrassment and doubt.

study_success.title: Productive Study Session
study_success.description: You completed your study session with the textbook. You feel prepared and notice a flyer for an upcoming lecture series on campus mysteries.

guard_key.title: Key to Restricted Areas
guard_key.description: You slip the guard some cash. They look around nervously, then hand you a key. 'This opens some of the old maintenance areas. Don't get caught.'
